details.purpose: A cluster for recording findings on physical examination of the abdomen.

items.items: Findings related to the abdominal wall.
Detailed findings of a specific abdominal region.
Clinical description of findings related to the abdominal wall.
Findings related to a specific abdominal region.
Basic examination cluster for describing findings on physical examination when there is no named focus of examination.
For recording findings on physical examination of the abdomen.
Textural description of the part examined.
A group of statements about the normality of the examination.
Drawing or image of the area examined.
